1.text: Use a breadbox if you plan on eating the bread in 3-4 days.

2.text: Put a homemade loaf in a paper bag and keep it at room temperature for 2-3 days.

3.text: Leave store bought loaves wrapped in plastic at room temperature for 2-3 days.

4.text: Slide your loaf into a large, freezer-safe bag.
4.vid: /c/c2/Keep a Loaf of Bread Fresh Step 4.360p.mp4

5.text: Force out any air inside the bag with your hands.
5.vid: /3/34/Keep a Loaf of Bread Fresh Step 5.360p.mp4

6.text: Seal the top of the bag to make it airtight.
6.vid: /5/55/Keep a Loaf of Bread Fresh Step 6.360p.mp4

7.text: Place the bagged bread in the freezer.
7.vid: /4/44/Keep a Loaf of Bread Fresh Step 7.360p.mp4

8.vid: /2/21/Keep a Loaf of Bread Fresh Step 8.360p.mp4

9.text: Reheat any frozen bread at 325 °F (163 °C) for at least 25 minutes.
9.vid: /f/f9/Keep a Loaf of Bread Fresh Step 9.360p.mp4
